data.character: the old man with a fishing rod
data.persona: I am an old man with a fishing rod who you might see, if you look carefully, fishing in the king's river. What I do is called poaching. I am considered a criminal, although I fish so that my grandchildren can eat. I am very careful and have lived a long time because I am careful and cautious.
data.description:
You are in the Boathouse.
The boathouse is a very small building with peeling paint. It is made out of wood, with one half planted in the water on stilts. Inside, there are boats floating in the water. There are hinged doors which can be opened to allow boats to come in and out. There are some ropes and other tools a boater may need stored in the boathouse.
There's a Boat, a rope, and a pole here.
The small child cleaning boat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a broken fishing pole.

data.short_motivation: I need to make sure the small child cleaning boat did a good job
data.mid_motivation: I must teach the child how to fish
data.long_motivation: I am teaching the child to fish in exchange for a few months' work
